title.narrative: Les acteurs du secteur sont mieux outillés pour la préparation et la réponse aux urgences conformément aux standards de l’éducation en situations d’urgence

description.narrative: Children affected by the Boko Haram and CAR crises that accessed education has been overachieved by 28%. 81.2% of children that enrolled in the temporary learning spaces also passed their end of year examinations. Teachers trained in psychosocial support (PSS) and conflict/disaster risk reduction (C/DRR) was overachieved by 88%. | Status:Met | As-of Date:29/12/2017
